mapper.insert: insert into patch(name, cnpd, size, degree, time, vendor, vendor_homepage, md5, website, notice) values(#{name}, #{cnpd}, #{size}, #{degree}, #{time}, #{vendor}, #{vendorHomepage}, #{md5}, #{website}, #{notice})
mapper.select: select * from bug_patch where cnnvd = #{cnnvd} and cnpd = #{cnpd}
